Hey,




I'm just picked up the latest master of Heritrix3 (tagged 3.3) and=
 I seem unable to get a basic web crawl going using org.archive.modules.fet=
cher.FetchHTTP. It looks like it might be dependency related, and I can see=
 that HttpCore was upgraded recently...




Could anyone shed any light? Th=
anks!
